actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Reveue Code of 1986 to provide that the basic standard deduction for heads of households shall be the same as the basic standard deduction for joint returns and surviving spouses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply to heads of households the same income tax basic standard deduction that is applied in connection with joint returns and surviving spouses (an increase of $600 under current law).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Reveue Code of 1986 to provide that the basic standard deduction for heads of households shall be the same as the basic standard deduction for joint returns and surviving spouses.
